content.rendered:
Laura Muson

Vice President of Customer Success

BS in Labor and Industrial Relations – Pennsylvania State University

 

Hi, I’m Laura Munson. In my role, I lead the ATR sales team nationally & offer strategic partnership to client companies. The Staffing industry is fast-paced, requires strong business acumen, and most importantly offers the gift to change people’s lives! Like our motto says: “Making the world a better place, one job at a time.”

 

ADVICE FOR CANDIDATES:

Your resume is your only tool to showcase who you are as a person. Make sure you put much thought into it and include relevant experience to the job you are applying for. Some candidates have different resumes reflecting different experience.

 

ADVICE FOR HIRING MANAGERS:

Bringing talent into your organization is probably the most important facet of building a strong company. Building strong relationships with your talent providers helps to identify best cultural and technical fits for your team.

 

HOBBIES AND INTERESTS:

I love to experience restaurants with amazing atmospheres and delicious food. I enjoy hiking, sipping lemonade on a deck with a view and friends.

 

FAVORITE PLACE:

Hotel Del Coronado. So beautiful to sit at the beach and enjoy the history of the hotel from 1888.

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope or confidence.” – Helen Keller
